dialogues.text: Can we deal with your sexual insecurities at another time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean after it's too late?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris seems to come around to Wisdom's logic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris I wish you'd given me a chance to chain him up before you decided to prune him into a stump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are both filled with dread.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wisdom You think he knows? Already?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: white room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris on the floor. His expression hardens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CorrIDORS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris and Wisdom stride through the facility almost at a run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WiSDOM I haven't made any firm decisions. Maybe we will just keep him tied up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you, he doesn't read minds. He sees the results.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris rises from the floor into a crouched position, like animal ready to pounce.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door flies open and A DOZEN ARMED MP's charge in, rif at the ready, and surround Cris. Cris checks the time on digital clock. It's 5:12 PM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Corridors

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris and Wisdom getting closer; he's on a cellphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom Tell Baines to meet us there. And bring a dozen men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Motionless, in a crouch...Cris suddenly dashes between tw MP's, shoves them aside, makes for the door. He gets smas by the RIFLE BUTTS of the nearest ones, then stomped by t full contingent. [Attempt #1]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AREA OUTSIDE THE White ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris and Wisdom arrive and look through the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris is alone in the room, in that crouched position. No MP's. What we've just seen...hasn't happened yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines arrives with THE DOZEN ARMED MP's we saw in the previous scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait for my signal, then go in and surround him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom and Ferris hurry upstairs into the Observation Boo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pass through the wall into the...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: White room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where in some future Cris is once again surrounded by the Dozen MP's who are actually outside, waiting to charge in Suddenly, Cris pounces low at one soldier's hips, shoving into the soldier next to him, which knocks over a third soldier. Cris dashes for the door, but four MP's pull him away before he can get out. [Attempt #2]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Observation ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris and Wisdom enter and look down at Cris, who crouch alone, motionless, in the White Room. Ferris prepares to speak to him. Wisdom interrupts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do the talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom goes to the microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris, this Eric Wisdom. I'm the director of this facility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WISDOM (cont'd) We're in the middle of a Code Red, and we'd like your help in preventing a major catastrophe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside WHITE room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAINES and the DOZEN MP's wait, ready to charge in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WISDOM (o.s.) I apologize for the way you've been treated. Agent Ferris got a little carried away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: White room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris, once again surrounded by the same Dozen MP's, sudde punches one of them, kicks another, and now has the mobil to start using his Tai Chi moves. But the other MP's gang on him and pile on, burying him under their weight. [Atte

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wisdom (o.S.) Could I ask you as a favor to please sit in the chair so we can begin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: observation ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom and Ferris watch as Cris still just crouches there motionless, alone, in the empty room. He checks the clock It's 5:09 PM. Just minutes before The MP's will charge in the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris runs to the door and tries to bar it so they can't enter. He gets shoved aside by the force of the MP's as t charge in. [Attempt #4]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: observation ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom and Ferris watch as Cris still just crouches there motionless, in the empty room. Wisdom flicks off the mike

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WiSDOM What's he doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FeRRIS Looking ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to microphone) Cris, time is running out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: White room -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris is again crouched and surrounded by the Dozen MP's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wiSDOM (plasma screen) We need your cooperation right away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Cris attacks using his Tai Chi skills. He outfig four of them, but then is subdued by the others. [Attempt

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris is again crouched and surrounded by the Dozen MP's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wiSDOM (plasma screen) Cris, don't you feel some sense of obligation to the rest of us? Your ability could save so many lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly he repeats the martial arts attack, but refines beating six MP's this time before being subdued... [Attem

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris is again crouched and surrounded by the Dozen MP's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wiSDOM (plasma screen) Cris, don't you feel some sense of obligation to the rest of us? Your ability could save so many lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Faster and faster, over and over, Cris relives the attack perfecting his movements, finding new opportunities. His skill increases with each iteration as he anticipates eve soldier's action and counters it with the greatest econom means. [Attempts #7-12]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fight takes on the quality of choreography as the MP' seem to step right into Cris' punches and kicks. Cris fli and throws them into each other, leveraging their movemen to achieve his goals with perfect efficiency.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Cris still can't quite get out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking down at Cris, still crouched there, alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't give him time. Send them in now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines, do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ext. White ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines gives the signal and the dozen waiting MP's charge through the door, rifles at the ready. The foreseen attac now beginning in real time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. White room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MP's surround Cris, as foreseen. He remains in the ce of them, crouched, motionless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a long beat, they just stand there, rifles aimed at t frozen quarry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wiSDOM (plasma screen) Cris, don't you feel some sense of obligation to the rest of us? Your ability could save so many lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris suddenly attacks...and with perfect economy of movem like a diver executing thirteen twists in the second befo he hits the water, Cris executes the previous routine wit new "finale" and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elegantly slips past all the MP's into the hall - and sla the door behind him, locking them in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The escape has the quality of magic. It takes a beat for MP's to realize what has happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: oBSERVATION BOOTH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom and Ferris are agog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wISDOM What happened? - You idiots!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris draws her gun and charges down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OUTSIDE white room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris is waiting for her and somehow he has her gun in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CrIS Don't make me do what I can do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris spins and shoots Wisdom in the shin as he starts dow the stairs. Wisdom collapses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't get too attached to your arms and legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris spins and gets the drop on Baines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CrIS Don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines sets down his gun. Cris takes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let him out of here alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines opens the door to the White Room. MP's stampede ou hot pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: baINES Isolate the building. If there's one exit overlooked, he'll know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If there's one soft heart, one slow shooter, he'll know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris attends to Wisdom, bleeding on the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FeRRIS Don't worry. I caught him once; I'll catch him again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful. I don't want anything to happen to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They care about each other more than they've let on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: corridors

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris. Running. MP's and general Security Police close beh No place to hide. Soldiers open fire. Cris dives for the floor, tumbles, gets to his feet, serpentines, and ends u behind a door that opens at the moment, as if by mental command, shielding him from gunfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Security Police pour out from the other side. Cris reache around and grabs someone's gun. He opens fire, buying him enough cover to get to a doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris stops, thinks, then charges out shooting, fighting, running -- completing a condensed burst of four impossibl tasks that get him to the next point of refuge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He waits, thinks, charges and, with another burst of choreographed action, makes it into an elevator whose doo conveniently open at that moment. He darts inside, keeps shooting, presses certain buttons - starting several stor up, and waits for the doors to close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sergeant You five, up. You five, down. The rest stay with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Banks of monitors, each containing a grid of mini-frames containing the pov of a surveillance camera -- hundreds i all. LEO, the Soldier at the console, is twitchy and hype alert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo watches as the Security Forces split up. He scans the monitors to see where Cris will resurface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris climbs up through the ceiling panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. Elevator shaft - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the elevator stops, he rips open a VENTILLATION DUCT climbs inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DR. FIELDING approaches Wisdom with a syringe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No demerol. I need to be alert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him a local.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amanda, Ferris' junior analyst, rushes in with lab report

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: amanda You asked for these as soon as they were ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: amanda You might want to check this result.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She points to a particular page. Impatient, Ferris reads. eyes widen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FeRRIS How pregnant?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: amanda A few days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris turns to Wisdom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is getting interesting. We have a mating pair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Secure the female.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz sits in a waiting room by herself, reading a magazine Psst! She looks up at the camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris (o.c.) Unscrew the vent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves a chair under the vent and prepares to stand on The door opens and several MP's march in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Liz) We're here to protect you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without looking up at Cris, she moves the chair back agai the wall and sits in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris, frustrated, shimmies back through the vent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo checks all the video screens. Cris is nowhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo He must be in the walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Settling in, Cris looks at his watch. 5:17. He concentrat and time speeds by - until a flashlight beam lights up th duct from a distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I found him! In here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As more Security Police and flashlights fill the shaft, C checks his watch: 5:33.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is once again dark, quiet and empty. Cris looks at watch. 5:17.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris (to himself) Sixteen minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris takes a deep breath and crawls forward. Remarkably, seems to be CRAWLING OUT OF HIS MOTIONLESS BODY like a sn shedding its skin! - In fact, Cris 1 lies there in deep concentration, while Cris 2 creeps onward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris drops down from a ventillator shaft into an office. opens the door, walks into a corridor, and strides forwar preternaturally calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He advances through an unfolding panorama of "stage sets" which different hypothetical scenarios play out, one at a time, several simultaneously, or layered in like the melo themes in a round or fugue, creating the visual equivalen harmony and counterpoint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris encounters Security Police searching for him. When t discover Cris, they aim their weapons at him. He checks t time. Snapback a few seconds. He hides before they arrive

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He goes through a door into a room. People are there. Snapback. Hides in a different room. It's empty. Cris searches the room. Looks in the desk drawers. Puts things his pockets. The door flies open. Security Police find hi and shoot. Snapback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris treads down empty corridors. He multiplies into a le of Cris Johnsons, duplicated again and again, as he explo room after room, searching them sequentially. Simultaneou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spends much time in a Handyman's Storeroom, while othe Cris Johnson's fade away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris 27 finds the surveillance room with Leo in charge. C scans the room. He is seen. He waits to see who will shoo him first. He is hit in the chest. Fade out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris 35 gets caught by two Security Police. He fights the takes their guns, but gets killed by reinforcements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris 63 waits in a room and peers through a crack in the as his POV FAST FORWARDS, and he charts the comings and goings of the search parties, until they discover him, at which point he snapsback and hides in a different room. H hiding in many rooms simultaneously. Spying. Piecing toge the schedule of the patrol in that corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The same situations repeat. Scanning for security cameras Fighting. Winning. Losing. Dying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He goes down a stairwell. One version of himself exits at landing. A second iteration of himself continues to the n floor down. At that landing, two iterations of himself tu in different directions, left and right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We follow the one that went to the left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees MP's taking Liz from her holding room and escorti her somewhere else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He follows. Gets seen. By her. By them. Snapback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is waiting in several locations, watching to see where MP's will emerge with Liz. The MP's and Liz emerge from a elevator in one of the locations. The other Cris' fade ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz is ushered into a room and locked inside. Four guards depart. Two guards remain posted outside. They see Cris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs down stairs. Into the corridor. Into the room directly under the room where Liz is being held.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris enters A FORENSICS LAB where the captured bomb is be studied. There is a barrel of C4 PLASTIC EXPLOSIVE. MP's the room turn on him and open fire. Cris is blasted and f to the floor, dead. Snapback to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris, where he started, motionless as a hibernating bear, exploring his futures. CAMERA passes through walls, floor ceilings and finds Baines rushing through the corridors. Baines enters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom's office

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where Wisdom paces with one crutch while Ferris sits on a sofa like Rodin's Thinker, in concentration almost as dee Cris'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines He hasn't gotten out through any exit. The bad news is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wisdOM You've lost him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm issuing infrared to all my men. We should have a fix in a few minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You realize if he gets away now, we'll never get him back. He'll be out there, and he'll be our enemy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FeRRIS I know how to flush him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: bainES (at a loss) Fine. Tell me what to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thought crystallizes as she speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't actually have to do anything. (beat) We just have to decide to do something...unthinkable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris shudders at the dark brilliance of her own idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: int. ground floor of facility - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guards stand in a solid line. No way out. Cris off to one side, in a niche just inside the door. Camera pans and fi a second Cris standing back, away from an exit. Pans and finds a legion of Cris Johnsons, duplicated again and aga trying each exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At one dim exit, he lies on the ground, charred and dead, next to the gauntlet of MP's he has tried to outrun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom's office

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom and Baines are looking at each other, appalled, th turn to Ferris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to threaten to kill a pregnant woman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threats don't count. When he foresees that you actually did kill her, that she's dead... (beat) He won't let it happen. - He'll come to us. Surrender. And she'll live.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom regards her with perverse admiration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it only works if we're not bluffing. Because he'll know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom considers the decision that lies ahead for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris is still trying to get out the front door, but there one Soldier, call him CRACK SHOT, who kills Cris repeated Cris snapsback and tries various tactics, but he can't ge past Crack Shot alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gives up. Turns and runs back into the heart of the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris' mental pov expands to include the entire facility, a crystal doll house. Simultaneously, he is observing eve room, present in every room, charting the place, testing possible actions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The facility is a bee hive of activity. A bee hive that accelerates to fast forward -- until all times are simultaneous. Until the simultaneous activity is made eve denser by the accumulated layers of possibility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris-134 spies Ferris and Wisdom walking together. He fol them for a while, until he is discovered. Cris-134 fades The Ferris and Wisdom who saw him fade out. But another Ferris and Wisdom continue through the building, and thei trail gets picked up by Cris-62, who has detoured in orde to encounter them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Cris' goals are accomplished, superfluous versions of himself fade away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The surveillance of a sequence of Ferris-and-Wisdoms is continued by Cris-91, then Cris-14, who watches as Wisdom Ferris approach two guards standing outside an INTERROGAT ROOM. We recognize them as the MP's who are guarding Liz, inside. Wisdom is let into the Interrogation Room by the MP's. Ferris proceeds into a nearby office alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: vENTILLATION duct

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris comes out of his trance. Checks his watch. Sixteen minutes have passed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris composes his thoughts, takes a breath, then crawls forward, leaving no Cris behind. Now it's for real.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A moment after he rounds a corner, A FLASHLIGHT BEAM stab into the duct that he vacated. It scans around. Withdraws

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The situations that Cris has just previewed from the Ventillator Shaft constitute the raw material that he wil now re-craft into a single narrative: the story of his ac escape attempt, staged in long takes, unfolding in almost real time. When appropriate, to illustrate Cris' ability, will portray several locations simultaneously via split- screens which change in number, size, shape, and placemen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ceiling. The ventillator grill pops open. Cris drops to t floor. He grabs a backpack conveniently hanging on a hook Without the slightest hesitation, he goes from shelf to b to drawer, loading particular objects into the backpack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Empty. A door opens. Cris steps out into the hall carryin the backpack and a foot stool. He stays close to a wall, steps on the foot stool, and spray-paints over the lens o surveillance camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo spots Cris as he blinds one camera after another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo I've got him. Third level, building C. Pete, Brian, get up there. Kyle, block off the west staircase. Jason, bring your dogs in from the east.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOLDIER PETE and SOLDIER BRIAN charge into an empty corri and begin their search for Cris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A door slams open, bashing Pete in the face. Cris breaks shooting arm, grabs his M-16, hides behind the door, and sprays bullets low, hitting Brian in the shins. He runs t Brian, breaks his shooting arm, takes his rifle. Drags Br and Pete into an open room. Tapes their mouths.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines arrives and takes command.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo He was on third level seventy seconds ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BaINES But where is he now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris pours floor polish in specific places.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOLDIER KYLE and his TROOP charge out off the stairwell. one steps directly into the polish and slips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they fall, Cris punches them out or puts them in chokeholds, utilizing the elegant minimum of force or violence. Child's play. As soon as they are unconscious, takes their guns, tear gas, and a gas mask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOLDIER JASON and THREE TROOPS are on the way, each with GUARD DOG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris lies in wait for the patrol. When they appear, he is perfectly placed to mace each dog and each soldier with a quick spritz. He goes back and sprays them again, to keep them out of commission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surveillance room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris appears on several screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's on this floor!...Shit! He's coming here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens. A tear gas canister flies in. A moment la Cris charges in wearing a gas mask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens fire at the video monitors, shattering every one

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By the time the MP's are ready to respond, Cris reaches a grabs Baines' handgun. He swings out into the corridor wi Baines' gun in his hand...Without looking, his hand aims shoots several times.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emerging into the hallway, Cris looks down at the end of hall and sees two MP's falling to the floor, wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris wraps electrical tape around the door handle and a p on the wall, sealing the room shut, then turns and maces last of the dogs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the tear gas clears, the damage is visible. Every moni in the surveillance system has been shattered. Leo, cough feels his way to a phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom answers on speakerphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LEO (o.c.) He blinded us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAINES (o.c.) And the dogs are useless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris stares at Wisdom expectantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's getting away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris, on the run, encounters CRACK SHOT - not where he wa seen in prevision. Crack Shot reaches for his gun. Cris breaks his arm before Crack Shot can fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom on the phone. Ferris watching in suspense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any developments on the Code Red? ...Let me know if there are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hangs up, discouraged. Dials a number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines, bring the girl friend to the Interrogation Room. (to Ferris) I'll deal with her there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris sneaks into room where he foresaw that Liz will be brought. The door is recognizable by its industrial look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where Liz is being baby-sat by four MP's. Baines enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're moving her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris writes a note. Slips it onto a side table. Opens the drawer of a desk. Writes in it. Puts something inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines and the four MP's arrives with Liz. Baines, Liz, a two MP's wait while two officers carefully open the door check out the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We expect them to find Cris. But they don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, in the hall, a pencil rolls on the floor toward She notices it and looks where it came from. Sees Cris, hiding behind a janitor's cart. He puts his fist over his heart. Gesture of love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two MP's in the room signal for Liz to be brought ins

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two MP's outside the room bring her in. Baines stays on g outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While the Guards stand on alert, Liz sits in a chair and discovers a piece of paper on a side table, placed exactl where her hand has come to rest. On the paper, in pencil, square with a square cross within. She flips over the not It reads, "GO CRAZY!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She considers, then SCREAMS as loud as she can while runn around wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hearing the commotion, Baines opens the door. Behind his back, Cris steps from hiding, opens the door to a room an slips inside, closing the door just as Baines looks back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MP's force Liz into a chair behind a desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit there and shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz sees a drawer which is partially open. She looks insi Sees a hefty pair of scissors. Inside the drawer, a messa is written on the wood. "5:44, stab Wisdom." She looks at clock in the room. 5:41. But Wisdom isn't there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom and Ferris, walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You understand what's at stake here? We're playing for the future. Not just what happens next, but what the future is. What the rules are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FERRIS (cont'd) If one man will know it and control it -- and have power over the rest of us. Or if we'll have power over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By killing an innocent woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks him in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you want, I'll pull the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think that might be...more reliable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She accepts the terrible responsibility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll join you in a minute. I need to take care of some details.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom turns to Baines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get more men up here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris walks to a nearby office and goes inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz anxiously checks the clock. 5:43 and still no Wisdom. Then the door opens. And Wisdom enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They study each other, neither knowing the other's plans. glances aside at the clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She picks up the phone. Dials a number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Ferris. I'll need a chopper tanked up and ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind her, Cris steps out of hiding. By the time she see him, his forearm is around her neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At 5:44, Liz grabs the scissors, lunges at Wisdom, and st at his neck. He raises his arm in time to block the blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two MP's in the room fight her off, calling to the sentinels outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines and the sentinels rush in to help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the corridor is empty and no one is looking, the doo Ferris' office opens, and Cris emerges with Ferris as his hostage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MP's drag Liz away from Ferris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not listening) Where the hell did she get the scissors?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris and Ferris make their way toward the entrance. They across a Patrol. The MP's take aim. Cris holds his gun to Ferris' head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold your fire. (gets on the radio) We've got the target in plain sight in Corridor 2C, but he's holding a hostage. Agent Ferris. - Request instructions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IntERROGATION ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines, on the radio, turns to Wisdom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You won't believe this. He's got Ferris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, but he's on his way to the front door. (beat) They want instructions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom thinks hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't shoot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then how are we going to stop him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't. We let him go. - It's part of the plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baines tries not to be insubordinate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sure about this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, but Ferris is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom takes a deep breath - then grabs Liz by the arm an aims his gun at her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope he loves you as much as I love her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris marches Ferris through the building, flanked by Secu Police who aim at him but hold their fire. WISDOM'S VOICE comes over the public address system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wisdom (o.c.) Cris Johnson...I've got your girl friend. We know her condition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That gets his attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: wisdom (o.c.) Something very bad will happen at six o'clock unless you're back in custody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Ferris) He hasn't got the balls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll find out, won't we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IntERROGATION ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom holds Liz at gunpoint. She seems remarkably calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not going to kill me. That's what the bad guys do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In war, you have to be as ruthless as your enemy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (emphatic) Cris isn't the enemy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't mean him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Near lobby, where Crack Shot repeatedly nailed Cris. This time Crack Shot's shooting arm is in a sling, and he crou next to a substitute sniper, who lies in wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris walks into view and fires one shot, which wings the substitute sniper -- causing him to miss his shot at Cris

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris pulls Ferris to the next location.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom and Liz. He watches the clock. Now she's afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't you just leave us alone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes his head, trying to gather courage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another sniper takes aim at a section of hallway that Cri approaching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Cris enters the sniper's field of vision, he shifts Fe to a different position, blocking the shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they pass under him, Ferris sees the sniper above. Cri takes aim at an empty space and fires just as a soldier charges from hiding and absorbs the bullet as if delibera catching it with his body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God, you're remarkable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris breaks a window. Tosses a grenade outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish you had a little more sense of duty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say you have way too much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The grenade explosion attracts many of the guards. Cris a Ferris slip out the front door where the Guards were previously stationed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He addresses a Soldier in a patrol car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me your keys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Soldier obeys. Cris shoves Ferris into the car and ge in after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to soldier) If I see you, I'll kill her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drive off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IntERROGATION ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom, agonized, is about to pull the trigger. Liz, trembling, sees that he's going to do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ext. Car - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driving away. Ferris realizes that Cris' escape is going be successful. She checks her watch. It's 6:13.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what our problem is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "We got off on the wrong foot."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has taken the words right out of her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's really...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "all been a big misunderstanding."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "We've never meant you any harm."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sounds so insincere when you say it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess you're a better liar than I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what I'm going to say next?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll never happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She offers her card.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My door will be open. We can start from scratch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes it. The phone number stands out: 888-CFerris. Fl the card out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The magic word is cooperate. That's all we've ever wanted to hear from you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A helicopter lands on the road ahead, blocking the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When are they going to give up? After you're dead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris holds his gun threateningly to Ferris' head. Two MP' get out of the helicopter, carrying something heavy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris reacts to what he can't see yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are carrying a body. They remove the hood from its h It's Liz. Dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaking with rage, Cris prepares to shoot Ferris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. HOMELAND SECURITY - Corridors - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty minutes earlier. Cris is marching Ferris through t corridors to the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ferriS I wish you had a little more sense of duty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris stops in his tracks, quaking with rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To a gang of murderers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris seems pleased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see you got our message.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He checks his watch. 5:54.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's about to happen...you've brought it on yourselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris changes course and charges into a...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: which he descends at a run, roughly dragging Ferris with

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: fERRIS It's not too late Cris. You can save her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm planning on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris shoves Ferris in front of him as a shield. Approachi turn in the stairs, he fires blindly. Rounding the turn, sees his would-be assassin collapsing, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom keeps his gun aimed at Liz's head as he watches th clock: 5:55 PM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soldier He's heading this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris charges out of the stairwell, shooting without hesitation - forward, left, right, back - efficiently targeting Security Police in the precise order of their imminent readiness to fire at him. For each bullet, one soldier dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom's voice comes over the P.A. System.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WiSDOM (o.S.) Johnson, this is Wisdom. It's 5:55. You have five minutes to turn yourself in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris and Ferris keep moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom (o.S.) Or your worst nightmare will happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris marches right up to the Interrogation Room where Wis holds Liz prisoner, using Ferris as a human shield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WisDOM (o.S.) Look ahead if you don't believe me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris opens the door to the room, revealing Wisdom, Ferris and thirty Security Police and MP's - who take aim at him fire. Cris gets chopped to pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris crouches on the floor outside the Interrogation Room reaches up and opens the door. He gets off a shot at Wisd who lives long enough to put a bullet in Liz's heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris uses Ferris as a shield, gets off a burst of shots a Wisdom, killing him instantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But a Soldier at Wisdom's side puts a bullet in Liz's hea then the thirty Security personnel blast Cris and Ferris pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris, dragging Ferris, arrives at the level of the Interrogation Room and continues down one more flight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using Ferris as a human shield, he shoots his way into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where Cris previously saw the seized barrel of C4 Explosi He guns down several armed MP's whom he knows would be present, then threatens the technicians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They flee. Cris locks himself and Ferris inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris goes over to the bomb. Squints for a beat. IN FAST FORWARD, CONDENSED TIME, MULTIPLE SNAPBACK, he goes throu the whole learning curve on bomb detonation, blowing hims up - and snapping back to life -- several times before figuring out the right way to set it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom holds Liz at arm's length with his gun pointed at head. Watching the clock count up to 6:00 PM. It's 5:59:4 /42/43...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris moves the bomb. Closes his eyes for a beat. Moves th bomb again. Closes his eyes. Opens them. Sets the detonat to 10 seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MP's wait, preparing to gun down Cris when he emerges. Th door opens. Ferris sprints out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: feRRIS It's going off in ten seconds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd flees with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wisdom watches the clock count advance. 5:59:55/56/57...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now empty. Cris runs for it. Dives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Wisdom prepares to the pull the trigger, the bomb expl in a giant cataclysm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke and dust

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roiling. Opaque. Then clearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The center of the building

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is gone. A jagged raw atrium extends several stories down up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To the side, on a narrow ledge of floor extending from a wall...crouches Liz. The only person remaining. She has survived by inches. Very precise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she recovers from the blast, a door opens behind her. appears, extends a hand and helps her from her perch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ext. North vegas airport - night

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A private jet warms up on the tarmac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ext. Private jet - night

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris and Liz bound up the entry steps, exhausted but elat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the door, no one is present to greet them. Odd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They continue into the main cabin, where Neal, the Showgi the Pilots, and the Flight Attendant are glued to the television. Neal sees Cris and Liz, but hardly acknowledg them. He's in shock. They all are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris and Liz turn to the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TV NewsCASTER (o.S.) The situation in Chicago is not quite as severe as in the other nine cities where the dirty bombs exploded, as prevailing winds blew the nuclear waste across Lake Michigan rather than straight into town. Radiation levels in Detroit, on the other hand, may require the entire city to be evacuated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz and Cris look at each other, ashen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what they wanted you to prevent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you wouldn't help?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They didn't explain. They were trying to force me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz shakes her head, incredulous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CrIS They were gonna make me a slave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at Cris like he's scum - and heads for the fron the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz? Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz To the doctor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks out of the jet and down the steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's not coming with us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris stands there, bereft, and watches her go. He has run of futures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tears escaping from his eyes. ROTATE FRAME and discover t the previous cut was actually a...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where Cris lies in bed with Liz's head on his chest, the morning after their first night [p. 45]. Since that point Cris has been up for hours - scanning the futures. Findin path worth taking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. Wisdom's HOUSE - dawn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris sleeps next to Wisdom. She's hogged the covers. He cell phone rings. Drowsily, she answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FeRRIS Ferris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris (o.c.) This is Cris Johnson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sits up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get this number?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. Liz's kitchen - dawn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris is dressed. Despondent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CrIS I want to cooperate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's music to my ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I have conditions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure we can work something out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: liz's bed - dawn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz. Sleeping. Cris sits next to her on the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her eyes flicker open. She sees him looking down at her l an angel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LiZ Come back to bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't. - I have to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (incredulous) You're not leaving?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something I have to do. Something you'd want me to do. And I can't put it off any longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (wounded) Fine. Then go. What do I care?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz, it's not like that. I searched for you for a long time. I want to be with you forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't overdo it. We just met last night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But a lot has happened since then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While I was sleeping?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He proceeds with difficulty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to have a child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you really are an angel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't expect you to believe me. But when you do find out, remember that we came together for a reason. That this wasn't just...one night. It was a special chance for both of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seeing his misery, she softens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why are you running away from me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds back tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not...I'm taking the long way around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now she's crying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand. We got off to such a great start.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods, wistful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I looked for a happy ending... But this was the best I could do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kiss good-bye, and she makes it so wickedly sweet th he can barely pull himself away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz watches, mystified, as he leaves - stirred by feeling for Cris that are just coming into being.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See ya?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't be surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he walks out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ext. LiZ'S HOUSE - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cris walks down the driveway to the street. He stands the beat, then Ferris' car drives up and stops in front of hi Cris opens the passenger door and gets in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. Ferris' car - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at each other, coming from very different place

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris Mr. Johnson, we meet at last.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wasn't ready till now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferris shifts into gear and drives off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have time to waste. Maybe you could start by telling me how your talent works.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He thinks how to phrase it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "The future ain't what it used to be." Ever hear that expression?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ext./Int. front window of cottage - DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz watches from inside as Ferris' car pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRIS (v.O.) It's a joke, but it's true. The future changes every time you look at it. Because you looked at it. Cause once you see it, you're different. And that changes everything else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz puts her hand on her belly.
